participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
My parents are very supportive of my decision to take a break from work to focus on my family.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.
i drink coffee every day.

My family is close and we like to go out for ice cream together.
I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her.
its good to eat a lot of veggies.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.
i grew up in nevada.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to be talking to you.
Me too! I'm learning how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together.
That's awesome! I'm sure your dog will love that. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Cocoa. She's the sweetest dog ever.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I grew up with one named Bailey.
I'm glad you like them! I love mine.
Do you have any other pets?
No, just Cocoa. I've always wanted a cat, but my husband is allergic.
I'm sorry about that. Cats are great pets.
Hopefully! What's your favorite type of food?
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
That's awesome! I try to eat that way as much as possible.
Me too! I think it's important to support local farmers.
I agree. It's also better for the environment.
Definitely! I'm glad you think the same way.
Me too! I'm always happy to meet someone who shares my values.
Me too! I think we're going to get along great
